verses.text: 那些在床上圖謀不義，並且行惡的人有禍了！因為他們的手有力量，天一亮，就作出來了。

words.note: Often used in theological contexts.
A common biblical expression for pronouncing judgment.

words.definition: at dawn, as soon as it's bright

verses.text: 他們要田地，就去搶奪；想要房屋，就去強取。他們欺壓人和他的家眷，取人和人的產業。

words.note: In biblical context, often refers to inherited land or possessions.

verses.text: 因此耶和華這樣說：看哪！我策劃災禍攻擊這家族，你們無法縮起頸項避開這災禍。你們不能昂首而行（「昂首而行」或譯：「高視闊步」）；因為這是個災難的時代。

words.note: A typical opening for prophetic pronouncements.
Describes a confident or arrogant posture.
An idiom describing a pompous or arrogant walk.

verses.text: 到那日，必有人作歌諷刺你們，唱悲傷的哀歌，說：「我們徹底被毀滅了，我子民分內的產業，他竟轉給別人了；他怎可從我這裡挪去，把我們的田地分給擄掠我們的人（「分給擄掠我們的人」或譯：「分給背道的人」）！」

words.note: A common biblical idiom referring to a future time of divine intervention or judgment.
A song of mourning or sorrow, common in the Psalms and prophetic books.
Commonly refers to God's chosen people in the Bible.
In biblical context, often refers to inherited land or possessions.
Used to pre-pose the object of a verb, marking it as a recipient of action.

words.definition: give to those who plundered us

words.note: 背道 means 'to turn one's back on the Way,' referring to apostasy.

verses.text: 因此你在耶和華的會眾中，必沒有抽籤拉準繩的人了。

words.note: Refers to the gathered people of God.

words.definition: surely not have, there will not be

words.note: A method used in ancient times for making decisions or distributing land.
Used for surveying land or ensuring upright construction, often metaphor for justice.

verses.text: 有人預言說：「你們不要說預言；人不可預言這些事；羞恥不會臨到我們。」
雅各家啊！人怎可說：「耶和華的心著急（「耶和華的心著急」 直譯是「耶和華的靈是短的嗎」），不能忍耐呢？這些是他的作為嗎？」我耶和華的話對行事正直的人不是有益的嗎？

words.note: Often refers to divine spirit in biblical context.

verses.text: 你們卻像仇敵一樣，起來攻擊我的子民（「你們卻像仇敵一樣，起來攻擊我的子民」或譯：「然而，我的子民竟興起來像仇敵一樣」）；你們竟從安詳過路的人身上剝去衣服，從不願作戰的人身上剝去外衣。

words.note: Common in Bible commentaries for alternative translations.

verses.text: 你們把我民中的婦女趕逐，離開歡樂的家園；你們把我的尊榮，從她們的嬰孩身上奪去，直到永遠。
起來，走吧！這不是你們安息之地；你們因為不潔淨的緣故，必被毀滅，是不可挽救的毀滅。

words.note: Often refers to Sabbath rest or eternal rest.
Classical Chinese possessive particle, similar to modern 的.

verses.text: 若有人隨從虛假的心，撒謊說：「我要向你們說清酒和烈酒的預言。」那人就是這民的預言家了。

words.note: More formal or literary than 跟隨.
Often refers to unfermented or new wine.
Refers to fermented, intoxicating strong drink.
Lit. 'fore-speak'.
One who delivers prophecy.

verses.text: 雅各家啊！我必召集你們所有的人，聚集以色列的餘民；我要把他們安置在一起，像羊在羊圈裡，像群羊遠離了人，在草場上喧嘩。

words.note: Used here in a vocative sense, addressing the house of Jacob.
Often refers to the faithful few chosen by God.

verses.heading: The Lord Will Restore His People

verses.text: 開路的人領先上去；他們開路，闖門進入，又從門裡出來；他們的王在他們面前走過，耶和華領導他們。

words.definition: clear a path, open a road

words.note: A directional complement verb compound.

words.definition: clear a path, open a road

words.note: Implies forceful or sudden entry.
A directional complement verb compound.
Verb with aspect marker/complement, indicating passing.
The personal name of God in the Old Testament.
